title: Gagarin Becomes First Human in Space
summary: On April 12, 1961, Soviet cosmonaut Yuri Gagarin became the first human to travel into outer space, completing one orbit of Earth aboard Vostok 1 in 108 minutes. His mission marked a historic milestone in the Space Race and demonstrated that human spaceflight was possible. Gagarin became an international hero and his flight accelerated the American commitment to reach the Moon.
